body: Foes without a swim speed provoke attacks of opportunity from you underwater.
name: Aquatic Advantage

sections.body: Combat Reflexes, must have a natural swim speed.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: A creature that lacks a swim speed provokes an attack of opportunity from you when it attacks you underwater. You don't get an attack of opportunity if the attacker is under the effects of freedom of movement .
sections.name: Benefits
